page.title: 10Religion in Springfield
page.content: {Springfield Parish Church}was built in 1861, the date is beside the clock which was added around 1878. The church itself is beautiful each pew has a soft cushion across it. The church does not have an organ, but taped music is played. It also has stained glass windows, which are windows made into pictures from fragments of coloured glass. The { {Minister's}job is mostly to look after people, visit homes and hospitals. He has also to look after the 250 members of the Springfield Parish Church. The Minister has {Elders} to help with his work. The Elders look after people too. He has 10 Elders and they each look after 20 houses.
